doc:
Crispin Freeman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Crispin_Freeman 0 Crispin Freeman (born February 9, 1972) is an American voice actor, ADR director and writer who has provided voice-overs in numerous English language versions of Japanese anime, cartoons and video games. In anime, some of his prominent roles include Zelgadis Graywords in Slayers, Alucard in Hellsing, Kyon in The Melancholy of Haruhi Suzumiya, Kirei Kotomine in Fate/Zero and Fate/stay night: Unlimited Blade Works, Itachi Uchiha in Naruto and Shizuo Heiwajima in Durarara!!. He has also voiced Roy Harper on the American animated series Young Justice and Winston on the video game Overwatch. Crispin_Freeman ( born February_9_,_1972 ) is an_American_voice_actor , ADR_director and writer who has_provided voice-overs in numerous_English_language_versions of Japanese_anime , cartoons and video_games . In anime , some of his_prominent_roles include Zelgadis_Graywords in Slayers , Alucard in Hellsing , Kyon in The_Melancholy of Haruhi_Suzumiya , Kirei_Kotomine in Fate/Zero_and_Fate/stay_night : Unlimited_Blade_Works , Itachi_Uchiha in Naruto and Shizuo_Heiwajima in Durarara !! . He has_also_voiced Roy_Harper on the_American_animated_series_Young_Justice and Winston on the_video_game_Overwatch .
